Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The market volatility, as measured by VIX, is currently in an ELEVATED regime at 20.52 on 2025-11-24.
  • This follows a recent period of STRESSED conditions with VIX peaking at 26.42 on 2025-11-20.
  • The most extreme market positioning was observed when the VIX was in STRESSED territory.

Technical Summary:

  • The current MVS_z of 0.727 (ELEVATED) reflects elevated VIX levels and percentile rank.
  • Recent high d20_z values (e.g., 2.63 on 2025-11-20) indicated strong upward momentum, suggesting a volatility squeeze.
  • The shift from STRESSED to ELEVATED, with a negative d5_z (-0.749) on 2025-11-24, suggests some unwind risk.

References:

  • Market Volatility Signal (VIXCLS) data, latest 2025-11-24.
  • Conclusions primarily influenced by VIX, MVS_z, and d5_z/d20_z components.
  • Public datasets that would improve future analysis include Liquidity Composite data.
  • Additional valuable data would be Credit Spreads (e.g., High-Yield OAS).
